Uses of Class
javax.rmi.CORBA.Stub

  • Packages that use Stub 
    Package Description
    javax.rmi.CORBA
    Contains portability APIs for RMI-IIOP.
    org.omg.stub.java.rmi
    Contains RMI-IIOP Stubs for the Remote types that occur in the java.rmi package.
